title: Camera Perspective
description: A perspective camera containing properties to create a perspective projection matrix.

aspectRatio.description: The floating-point aspect ratio of the field of view.
aspectRatio.gltf_detailedDescription: The floating-point aspect ratio of the field of view. When undefined, the aspect ratio of the rendering viewport **MUST** be used.

yfov.description: The floating-point vertical field of view in radians. This value **SHOULD** be less than Ï€.

zfar.description: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane.
zfar.gltf_detailedDescription: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane. When defined, `zfar` **MUST** be greater than `znear`. If `zfar` is undefined, client implementations **SHOULD** use infinite projection matrix.

znear.description: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.
znear.gltf_detailedDescription: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.
